designSystem.name: Wireframe Kit Design System
designSystem.description: A comprehensive wireframe-styled design system with 2px borders, flat shadows, and Shantell Sans typography

rules: Use 2px black borders on all interactive elements
Apply flat shadows (6px offset) to overlays and dropdowns
Use Shantell Sans typography for headings and labels
Use black focus states with gray outline shadows
Use light gray hover states for secondary elements
Never use default shadcn/ui colors without customization
context: This is a wireframe-styled design system. When generating components, you MUST follow these design principles. All components should have 2px borders, flat shadows, and use the Shantell Sans font. You can reference any component from the registry at https://wireframe-registry-template.vercel.app/r/{component-name}.json
